metadata.title: CVE-2024-11692 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could cause a select dropdown to be shown over another tab;this could have led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 133, Firefox ESR < 128.5, Thunderbird <133, and Thunderbird < 128.5.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
